channel.title: [Delta] Add Variable to Character Files [Delta]
channel.description:
Hey i just started a new project, i need to know how to make : like Donater = 0 but then redmont =1
how can i do that?? in what files i have to add stuff and make stuff make stuff in client.java strings and such

item.title: [Delta] Add Variable to Character Files [Delta]

item.description:

public int donator = 0;
public int redmont = 1;[/quote]

i searshed for every Donator thing that has to do with character files and i copyed that and changed all to redmont.

and made on top of client.java a public int redmont = 0;

but i get 3 error’s
